name: elevator
title: The Elevator
statement1: You are in the lobby of your friend’s new apartment building. You press the button to the elevator to go up. The building looks old. As you get on the elevator you think about its safety.
question: Did you think about the elevator’s safety?

name: wedding
title: The Wedding Reception
statement1: Your friend asks you to give a speech at her wedding reception. You prepare some remarks and when the time comes, get to your feet. As you speak, you notice some people in the audience start to laugh.
question: Does the audience laugh when you speak?

name: job
title: The Job
statement1: You are currently working as a contractor for a company. Once this job is finished, you will be without employment until you can find your next job. You think about not having an income for a few weeks and about your future finances.
question: Will you be without an income soon?

name: noise
title: The Loud Noise
statement1: You are woken up in the middle of the night by a loud noise. You are not sure what caused the noise and leave your bedroom to see what happened. You walk downstairs.
question: Have you been woken up in the middle of the night?

name: friend
title: Meeting a Friend
statement1: In the street you bump into an old friend you haven't seen for a long time. She is too busy to stop, so you arrange to meet later in a bar.  You arrive a little late but the bar is empty and a few minutes later she is still not there.
question: Did your friend stop?

name: lunch
title: The Lunch
statement1: You are eating lunch with a friend. As you start eating your salad, you describe your plans for the weekend. You accidentally drop a piece of lettuce, and your friend looks at you.
question: Do you have salad for lunch?

name: scrape
title: The Scrape
statement1: You are playing basketball with some friends. While running toward the ball, you trip and scrape your knee. The scrape hurts a bit, but does not bleed.
question: Are you playing soccer with your friend?

name: shopping
title: The Shopping Trip
statement1: You are at the mall with your friend. While you shop, she tells you how several of her friends have recently come down with a strange illness. You think about your recent health, and wonder if you will get sick.
question: Are you shopping alone?

name: bloodtest
title: The Blood Test
statement1: You are at a routine doctor's appointment. At the appointment, the doctor decides to run a few blood tests to check your health. The doctor says he will call you in a few weeks, and you will find out your test results at that time.
question: Did you take blood tests?
